nodes.text: Lo-Jad was a male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic in the decades leading up to the Invasion of Naboo; an event which would later be recognized as part of the end of the Golden Age of the Old Republic.

A Force-sensitive trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, Lo-Jad was raised to the rank of Jedi Master in the final decades of the Galactic Republic. Selecting Initiate Sia-Lan Wezz as his Padawan, Master Lo-Jad sent his apprentice to study at the Royal House of Learning in Theed, the capitol city of Naboo in the Chommell sector.
